item.description:
Tickets have been purchased.

For this Meet-up we will return to the Gamm Theater for "Circle Mirror Transformation." Here is the description on the Gamm's website:

Creative drama class is in session throughout Annie Baker’s poignantly funny, Obie Award-winning “best new American play” (2010). Marty, the indefatigably upbeat teacher at a community center in small-town Vermont, leads four motley students through a series of seemingly banal acting exercises. But the real drama lies beneath the games, where relationships form and fracture, and secrets unfold in comically insightful ways.

Ticket Information

Tickets are $46.75 (including Gamm's Convenience Charge.). Seating is reserved. (Prices at Gamm have gone up for 2011/12.  They are now $42.00 plus a $4.75 convenience charge.)

RSVPs for this Meetup will close on Friday, September 2nd. I will purchase the tickets on the 3rd.

Meet-up Logistics

We will meet at the Gamm Theater at 7:30 PM. I will also provide my cell number in case you need to reach me.

Payment Options

When you RSVP, there will be a question asking how you wish to pay for your ticket.  Please note that I must have payment prior to September 3rd so I can purchase our tickets.  I'm open to any option other than a personal check.  Here are my preferred choices:

1) If you're going to another Meetup with me prior to 9/3, you may pay me in cash or cashiers check at that time.

2) I can provide my mailing address and you can send me a cashiers check or money order.  (No personal checks.)  Remember, though, that I need it before 9/3.

3) Provide your e-mail address and I will send you a Paypal Invoice.  You may use that invoice to pay by credit card or direct bank debit.  Note that you do NOT need a Paypal account to pay by credit card.

Refund Policy

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if you change your RSVP to "NO" on or before 09/02/11.

Full refunds (including the convenience charge) will be provided if the play is sold out and we are unable to get tickets.

Once tickets are purchased on 09/03/11, no refunds will be provided.  You will be responsible for the disposal of your ticket if you're unable to attend.
